body_html:
You forgot to call .view on the output of .features.

In the future please remember that we're using the issues for bug reports and feature requests only. If you have questions or need help, please post on our forums.
body_text:
You forgot to call .view on the output of .features.
In the future please remember that we're using the issues for bug reports and feature requests only. If you have questions or need help, please post on our forums.
body:
You forgot to call `.view` on the output of `.features`.

In the future please remember that we're using the issues for **bug reports and feature requests only**. If you have questions or need help, please post [on our forums](discuss.pytorch.org).
